text_content.paragraph: This course consisted of 6 modules, including this one and the course introduction. The following were the content module titles:

At this time, your CHK Search querying skills should have improved so you can continue to help create a more effective and productive team. Remember, you play an important role in our organizationâ€™s success. Feel free to access the course resources anytime you need.

page.prompt: CLICK THE HIGHLIGHTED TEXT TO LEARN MORE. THEN CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.

popText.paragraph: The objectives for this module include:

bullets.bullet: Save, rename, delete and rerun a saved search
Add a property to My Properties, and
Customize search results by sorting them by columns, and rearranging columns

popText.paragraph: The objectives for this module include:

bullets.bullet: Export search results to Excel, and
Customize search results by changing which columns to display and grouping by column

popText.paragraph: The objectives for this module include:
The objectives for this module include:

bullets.bullet: Define multiple parameters in a Map/VAL search
